data.chText: 使（机器、计算机系统等）升级；提高；改进
data.enText: to make a piece of machinery, computer system, etc. more powerful and efficient
to give sb a more important job

data.chText: 提高（飞机乘客、旅馆住客等的）待遇；优待
data.enText: to give sb a better seat on a plane, room in a hotel, etc. than the one that they have paid for

data.chText: 提高（设施、服务等的）档次；改善；使升格
data.enText: to improve the condition of a building, etc. in order to provide a better service
to upgrade the town's leisure facilities

simple_means.memory_skill: up 上，向上 + grad 等级 + e → 升级；上升

means: 使(机器、计算机系统等)升级
提高(飞机乘客、旅馆住客等的)待遇

tr: the act of improving something (especially machinery) by raising it to a higher grade (as by adding or replacing components)
example: the power plant received a new upgrade

tr: hardware that provides better performance than an earlier version did
the property possessed by a slope or surface that rises

example: I got an upgrade to first class when coach class was full

tr: software that provides better performance than an earlier version did
an upward slope or grade (as in a road)
example: the car couldn't make it up the rise

tr: to improve what was old or outdated
example: I've upgraded my computer so I can run better software
The airline upgraded me when I arrived late and Coach Class was full
I upgraded to First Class when Coach Class was overbooked

tr: give a promotion to or assign to a higher position
example: John was kicked upstairs when a replacement was hired
Women tend not to advance in the major law firms
I got promoted after many years of hard work

value.boxr_value: The verb is pronounced /ʌp'greɪd/. The noun is pronounced /'ʌpgreɪd/. 动词读作/ʌp'greɪd/，名词读作/'ʌpgreɪd/。

value.def: If equipment or services are upgraded, they are improved or made more efficient.

example.ex: Helicopters have been upgraded and modernized...
example.tran: 直升机已经更新换代，装配了现代化设备。

example.ex: Medical facilities are being reorganized and upgraded.
example.tran: 正在对医疗设施进行重组和升级。

value.def: If someone is upgraded, their job or status is changed so that they become more important or receive more money.

example.ex: He was upgraded to security guard.

value.def: If you upgrade or are upgraded, you change something such as your air ticket or your hotel room to one that is more expensive.

example.ex: You can upgrade from self-catering accommodation to a hotel.
example.tran: 您可以将自理膳食旅店升级为酒店。

partsOfSpeech.dec: up 上，向上 + bound 向…方向走 → 向上走 → 上行的
up 上，向上 + braid 辫子 → 向上抓小辫子 → 谴责
up 上，向上 + front 前面 → 在前面（的）
up 上，向上 + grad 等级 + e → 升级；上升
up 上，向上 + heaval 举起 →〔矛盾〕上升 → 动乱
up 上，向上 + hold 支持 → 拥护
up 上，向上 + root 根 → 根除
up 上，向上 + turn 转 → （价格）上涨；好转
